function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of SARS-CoV-2 particles in the air of hospital wards","Impact":"Increased risk of patients and medical staff contracting SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Use of air filters to remove SARS-CoV-2 particles from the air","Technologies":"HEPA air cleaners","People":"Patients, medical staff","Owner":"Hospital management"},{"Description":"Presence of other pathogens in the air of hospital wards","Impact":"Risk of infections from pathogens such as Staphylococcus aureus, Escherichia coli, and Streptococcus pyogenes","Mitigation":"Use of air filters to remove various pathogens from the air","Technologies":"HEPA air cleaners","People":"Patients, medical staff","Owner":"Hospital management"}]}
